name: avoid_baseline
command: sirnaforge workflow TP53 --input-fasta examples/sample_transcripts.fasta --snp-file examples/variant_demo.vcf --variant-mode avoid --min-af 0.01 --output-dir workflow_output/avoid_baseline

name: avoid_include_low_af
command: sirnaforge workflow TP53 --input-fasta examples/sample_transcripts.fasta --snp-file examples/variant_demo.vcf --variant-mode avoid --min-af 0.0 --output-dir workflow_output/avoid_include_low_af

name: target_focus
command: sirnaforge workflow TP53 --input-fasta examples/sample_transcripts.fasta --snp-file examples/variant_demo.vcf --variant-mode target --min-af 0.03 --output-dir workflow_output/target_focus

name: both_lowfreq
command: sirnaforge workflow TP53 --input-fasta examples/sample_transcripts.fasta --snp-file examples/variant_demo.vcf --variant-mode both --min-af 0.005 --output-dir workflow_output/both_lowfreq

name: avoid_strict
command: sirnaforge workflow TP53 --input-fasta examples/sample_transcripts.fasta --snp-file examples/variant_demo.vcf --variant-mode avoid --min-af 0.05 --output-dir workflow_output/avoid_strict
